Title: Recoup Pipe HEX WWHRS heat exchange unit 2100mm Grey
Description: A popular WWHRS innovation, this Recoup Pipe HEX heat exchanger unit succeeds the Recoup Pipe+ HE, with a new Turbo Rotator for increased efficiency of up to 68.5% and an improved SAP pound to points ratio. Easy to install and highly durable, this compact unit requires no end user interaction and, thanks to its lightweight PVC outer, is an on-site theft deterrent. Offering simple, reliable heat exchange technology, Pipe HEX is recommended for new build homes, hotels and student accommodation.

Title: Recoup Pipe HEX Installation Pack install component pack various colours and size
Description: Offering waste water heat recovery for showers, the Recoup Pipe HEX installation pack is suitable for the Recoup Pipe HEX. This system recovers heat energy from your shower water, using it to heat mains cold for pre-heated water. This water is used by the shower and water heater, reducing hot water energy demand. With efficiency of up to 68.5%, the pipe HEX boosts SAP points and is easy to install, with no end-user interaction required. Designed for installation on the floor below the shower, this system is recommended for new build homes, hotels and student accommodation.
category: Renewables/Waste Water Heat Recovery Systems/Waste Water Heat Recovery Systems.csv -> Recoup Pipe HEX Installation Pack install component pack various colours and size

Title: Recoup Easyfit+ under bath horizontal waste water heat recovery system Black
Description: The Recoup Easyfit+ is a stand-alone horizontal Waste Water Heat Recovery System for Showers. Designed to slide directly under a standard bath or a walk-in shower tray. It recovers heat energy from shower waste water, using it to heat mains cold water, producing preheated water. The preheated water is used by the shower and / or water heater which reduces the hot water energy demand whilst showering. The Easyfit+ is easy to retrofit into an existing system or plan and install into any property design. Producing efficiencies of up to 47.6%, it is SAP listed, legionella control risk assessed and virtually maintenance free. It is a very exciting product for new-build, residential retrofit, apartment & social housing markets.
